pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Baby Essential Oil Protect 12ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Gentle essential oil blends designed to help baby through the day and night.

Common Uses

Help Baby Breathe Easier with Lemon, Eucalyptus, Lavender & Myrtle essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy for the relief of cold and flu symptoms.

Ingredients

Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Eucalyptus Radiata Leaf/Seam Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Myrtus Communis (Myrtle) Leaf Oil

Directions

How to Use: Use as required or up to 6 times a day.
Vaporisation: Add up to 6 drops (0.3mL) to the water in your vaporiser.
